Prior to March 17, 2028, at any time at a make-whole call of Bunds plus 15 basis points.
Prior to February 17, 2032, at any time at a make-whole call of Bunds plus 20 basis points.
On or after March 17, 2028, at any time at par.
On or after February 17, 2032, at any time at par.
At any time at par if certain events occur involving changes in United States taxation.
Application will be made to list the Notes on the New York Stock Exchange.
